Antiqua - Main Plaza.description: You arrive in a large plaza, contained by surrounding houses and shops. Cobbled pathways line the ground and a towering, multi-tiered fountain sits in the middle. A number of stalls surround the plaza, ready for merchants to lay out their wares. A waysign stands next to the fountain, directing travellers around the city.

fountain.description: Water flows from the top at a steady rate, pooling and falling from tier to tier. Rusted coins lay at the bottom of the fountain, representing the hopes and whims of the citizens of Antiqua.

waysign.description:
The waysign reads:
North: Docks District
West: Market District
East: Residential District
South: City Entrance
